sn38.14:1.6: “Atthi panavuso maggo atthi patipada, etasam dukkhatanam parinnaya”ti?
sn38.14:1.7: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada, etasam dukkhatanam parinnaya”ti.
sn38.14:1.8: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada, etasam dukkhatanam parinnaya”ti?
sn38.14:1.9: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo, etasam dukkhatanam parinnaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.14:1.11: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada, etasam dukkhatanam parinnaya”ti.
sn38.14:1.12: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada, etasam dukkhatanam parinnaya.
